00028 #include "qf_pkg.h"
00029 #include "qassert.h"
00030 
00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qf_pool)
00032

00038 // Package-scope objects -----------------------------------------------------
00039 QF_EPOOL_TYPE_ QF_pool_[3];                          // allocate 3 event pools
00040 uint8_t QF_maxPool_;                      // number of initialized event pools
00041 
00042 //............................................................................
00043 void QF::poolInit(void *poolSto, uint32_t poolSize, QEventSize evtSize) {
00044                          // cannot exceed the number of available memory pools
00045     Q_REQUIRE(QF_maxPool_ < (uint8_t)Q_DIM(QF_pool_));
00046                // please initialize event pools in ascending order of evtSize:
00047     Q_REQUIRE((QF_maxPool_ == (uint8_t)0)
00048               || (QF_EPOOL_EVENT_SIZE_(QF_pool_[QF_maxPool_ - 1]) < evtSize));
00049     QF_EPOOL_INIT_(QF_pool_[QF_maxPool_], poolSto, poolSize, evtSize);
00050     ++QF_maxPool_;                                            // one more pool
00051 }
